law.text: A person required to register under the provisions of KRS 17.510 and 17.520 shall be relieved of any further duty to register only upon reversal of the underlying conviction or upon a pardon.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 28, effective April 11, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 154, effective January 15, 1999.
